data.title: Board of Directors
data.text:
Wayne Wei-Ming Dai

Ph.D., University of California, Berkeley; Served as Tutor, Associate Professor and Professor of computer engineering at the University of California, Santa Cruz from 1988 to 2005; Served as Founder, Chairman and President of Ultima, USA from 1995 to 2000; Served as Co-Chairman and Chief Technology Officer of Celestry Technologies, Inc., USA from 2000 to 2002; Served as the Chairman and President of VeriSilicon since 2001.

Read More

Wei-Jin Dai

Master’s degree, University of California, Berkeley; Served as Project Manager of Hewllet-Packard from 1985 to 1991; Served as Preoject Director of Quickturn Design Systems from 1991 to 1996; Served as Vice President of Research and Development at Silicon Perspective Corporation from 1996 to 2002; Served as Vice President of Encounter Product Line of Leading Digital Implementation Systems Division of Cadence Design Systems from 2002 to 2007; Served as President and CEO of Vivante, USA from 2007 to 2016. Served as Director and Vice President of VeriSilicon since 2016 .

Read More

Wenqian Shi

Bachelor’s degree, Shanghai University of Finance and Economics. CICPA, ACCA, HKICPA, AICPA; Served as an Auditor of Ernst & Young Huaming LLP from 1998 to 2001; Served as a Financial Manager of Hewlett Packard Shanghai from 2001 to 2004; Served as Finance Controller of Essentra PLC, a supplier of plastic and fibre products, from 2004 to 2006; Joined VeriSilicon in 2006. Served as Director, Vice President, Chief Financial Officer and Secretary of the Board of Directors now.

Read More

Guodong Sun

Master's degree, MBA of Central University of Finance and Economics; Worked for Information Department and Personnel Department of China Development Bank headquarters from 2000 to 2009; Served as Deputy Division Director for Personnel Department of China Development Bank, Division Director for Personnel Department and Party Committee Organization Department of China Development Bank Hubei Branch from 2009 to 2014; Served as Director for Personnel Department of SINO-IC Capital LTD. and General Manager of SINO-IC Capital LTD. Shanghai Branch since 2014.

Read More

Xiaofei Chen

Master's degree, Intermediate Economist; Served as Department Manager of Changjiang Securities from 1998 to 2002; Served as Department General Manager of Xiangcai Securities from 2002 to 2008; Served as General Manager of Shanghai Honglin Investment Management from 2008 to 2009; Served as the Department General Manager of Qilu Securities from 2009 to 2015; Served as Chairman of Xingcheng Capital Investment since 2015; Currently Director of VeriSilicon.

Read More

Hong Chen

Master's degree; Years of executive management experience in cross-industry companies; Served as Deputy General Manager of Fullhan Microelectronics from 2004 to 2008; Served as General Manager of Shanghai Fanmei Clothing Co., Ltd. from 2008 to 2012; Served as Deputy General Manager of Shanghai Caiyun Trading Co., Ltd. from 2012 to 2014; Served as Deputy General Manager of 891 Health Technology Group Co., Ltd. from 2014 to 2017; Served as Chairman Assistant of Shenzhen Jia Valley Road Investment Management Ltd. from 2017 to now; Currently Director of VeriSilicon.

Read More

Zhihua Wang

Ph.D., Professor; Served as Tutor, Lecturer, Associate Professor and Professor of Tsinghua University since 1983; Served as a Visiting Scholar at Carnegie Mellon University from 1992 to 1993; Served as a Visiting Researcher at the Leuven Catholic University in Belgium from 1993 to 1994; Served as a Visiting Professor at the Hong Kong University of Science and Technology from 2014 to 2015; Currently Independent Director of VeriSilicon.

Read More
